Skills.Name: Burning Confidence
Skills.Tooltip: Hitting enemies with basic attacks has a chance to lower the cooldown of your spells

Skills.Name: Fuel the Flames
Skills.Tooltip: Kills grant a temporary stack of damage increase

Skills.Name: Incessant Kindling
Skills.Tooltip: All your burn effects last longer

Skills.Name: Trail Blazing
Skills.Tooltip: Leave behind a fiery trail burning your enemies

Skills.Name: Reinforcing Frost
Skills.Tooltip: Taking damage grants a stack of temporary damage reduction

Skills.Name: Perma Frost
Skills.Tooltip: All your slowing effects last longer

Skills.Name: Blizzard
Skills.Tooltip: As long as you have 4 or more slows on enemies a blizzard will slow and damage all nearby enemies

Skills.Name: Streamlined Firing
Skills.Tooltip: Succesive Basic attack hits increase your fire rate

Skills.Name: Disabling Flow
Skills.Tooltip: All your stun effects last longer

Skills.Name: Spontaneous Vortex
Skills.Tooltip: Chance to conjure a tornado on kill that sucks in and damages enemies
